title: I’m in Love With the Goddess, so I’m Going To Do My Best In a Different World - Novel Updates
tags: Dungeons   Game Elements   Humanoid Protagonist   Level System   Magic   Male Protagonist   Reincarnated in Another World   Vampires
author: Roku Kigawa   木川　陸
description:
The main character died in an accident, and a goddess from another world appeared in front of him and asked him to perform a certain task.

She asked him to do something for her, but he said, “Actually, I want you to go out with me!”

This is a story about a protagonist who fell in love with a goddess, he was reincarnated in another world, and tries his best to go out with her.>
